thread.title: Beautiful, Cozy little boutique hotel + in a HuTong!
thread.title_full: Beautiful, Cozy little boutique hotel + in a HuTong! - Review of The HuLu Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: jwdada
title: Beautiful, Cozy little boutique hotel + in a HuTong!
text:
My room was the smallest configuration, but everything I need was supplied. I came here during Winter, the heater did a great job warming us up during the cold January days! Staffs were great, friendly, speak good english and was helpful in assisting us with organizing transport to the ariport. Location was great, just 5 mins from the nearest train station, and close to some major tourist attractions.
Will definitely choose HuLu hotel for my next trip to Beijing!
